title: Hope Tech add thicker 2.3mm eMTB lightning bolt brake rotors, plus anodized Bosch mounts!
content:
British mountain bike manufacturers, Hope Technology, have added a couple new items to their ebike parts list. We take a look at the new 2.3mm thick V4 brake rotor with lightning bolt cut-outs, plus a new CNC machined head unit mount for the Bosch Kiox system.
